title: manidarAip-pirandavar
sahitya:
manidarAip-pirandavar Atma svarAjyattin mannargaL AvIrE


anupallavi

  punita matiyAlE pulangaLai aDakkiyE manadinai venru nan mantiri AkkiyE


caraNam    kaniyAda mAmaram karakkAda pashumADu kAril vidaikkAda Er nilam ennavAm
inid-aramporuL inbam anubhavittE vITTai iyalbuDan ALADa iha vAzhvum ennavAm
